Html:
Hello,
  People want to play with Oxite,
  People don't want to download and install those dependent libraries.
  So,why just simply put all the dependent libs(xunit.dll,blogml.dll,etc.) under the "Oxite\libs" folder?

Legally, we can not include them to follow MS-PL.  We agree it's a pain, but we can't include them.  Over time we will get rid of some of them.  We are also investigating possibly adding Oxite to the Windows Web App Gallery, which would simplify installation.
